altername_name: Dr. Mario Online Rx: Friend Battle
Dr. Mario & Germ Buster: Friend Battle
Dr. Mario & Saikin Bokumetsu: Furendo Taisen
name: Dr. Mario Online Rx
overview: The doctor is in! Mario takes a break from his adventuring ways and once again dons his stethoscope for a new generation of germ-battling mayhem. In addition to the classic mode of using vitamins to exterminate viruses, you'll find two battle modes and an online multiplayer mode where you can hone your skills against players from around the world. Dr. Mario Online Rx is a prescription for fun that everyone can enjoy.
